about_the_game:
The screen is big enough, why don’t we fully use it! Wonderland on Desktop will meet your idea! Doing multiple works while arranging your farmland!

3D experience!

Although it’s a tiny window, but there is full function illumination and day night cycle! 3D experience, use mouse wheel to change camera form 45’ angle to top down view. That’s incredible!

Pure Farming!

No missions, no target, no other requirement, but just all kinds of corps and undeveloped land！Planting corps, feed animals, produce products, unlock new corps, everything is simple!

Easier to farm!

Set working station, let NPC work for you. Just doing your own work or watch their behaviour, relax yourself.

Planting is meaningful!

More corps is not meaningful! But processor will make things different, produce corps to rations, use rations to exchange for coin then unlock more plants! That’s how things work!

Building, you will need more!

Unlock building and place them on land! They are not something for decorations, you could purchase more goods form them! The more the better!

Multi task, more than just farming!

It will not cover you whole screen by the borderless window. This land will stay at the bottom, you just need to check your little farm while working, studying, playing! And, by the way, don’t let your boss know that!

Minimum:
  • OS: window10/11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030

short_description: Wonderland on Desktop is a cozy farm sim idler game! The interface will locate at the bottom of your screen. Take care of your farm when working, studying, playing, experiencing the fun of multi threads! Cultivate magnificent thing on this little land on your screen!
